content.question: Write an essay in which you analyze the rhetorical choices Hazlitt makes to develop his argument about money.

frqParts.text: Write an essay in which you analyze the rhetorical choices Hazlitt makes to develop his argument about money.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
